Class ec.e.rep.RepositoryHandle 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.rep.RepositoryHandle
class RepositoryHandle
extends Object
RepositoryHandle instances are used in repository key Hashtables. They contain the RepositoryFile object associated with the file that contains the data, and the file position in that file.

This class is not public and can therefore cannot be used outside this package.
